caption.title: Dispersal of cassava brown streak viruses in Nakasongola district over 10 years, from 6 initially infected source fields.
caption.p: Dispersal of the pathogen between fields occurs through trade only, with within-field dispersal of whitefly. Nakasongola district is shown in cream, where each circle represents a growerâ€™s field, while triangles represent fields planted using certified clean planting material from a clean seed system. The legend describes the infection level in a field.
Click here for additional data file.
